learning_objective: Collect data using computational tools and transform the data to make it more useful and reliable.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex has a big presentation coming up for their school's Science Fair. They decide to do a survey among their classmates to gauge the level of interest in various science topics. They obtain the following data: 15 showed interest in Physics, 10 in Biology, 20 in Chemistry and 5 in Computer Science. They would like to present this data in a visually enticing manner to showcase these interests. Which computational tool would Alex use to transform this data into a more useful and reliable format for their presentation?",
    "Answer1": "Microsoft Word Document",
    "Answer2": "Adobe Photoshop",
    "Answer3": "Google Sheets or Microsoft Excel",
    "Answer4": "Notepad",
    "CorrectAnswer": "3",
    "Explanation": "Google Sheets or Microsoft Excel have built-in functionalities that allow users to easily convert data into different types of charts and graphs - bar graphs, pie charts, scatter plots, etc. This visual representation makes the data more understandable, useful, and reliable."
}
